h2_title: All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong
content: **Then, you need to upgrade the Old Gourd to Medicine Buddha Gourd. When you reach Chapter 5, you can find him again near The Emerald Hall. Speak with him, then examine the flame in the center of the room. Your Gourd will absorb the spirit and become the Supreme Gourd.**

This is an excerpt from the file 'Achievements_and_Trophies_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Achievements and Trophies Guide', specifically from the subsection 'All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Always Accompanied'.
The content is as follows:
**Then, you need to upgrade the Old Gourd to Medicine Buddha Gourd. When you reach Chapter 5, you can find him again near The Emerald Hall. Speak with him, then examine the flame in the center of the room. Your Gourd will absorb the spirit and become the Supreme Gourd.**
